name: A Tale Of Three Lands
description:
This is an indie Action-RPG in the style of The Legend Of Zelda series. This was made by a student developer who is fairly new to game development.  For now, it is just a short game prototype, but there are plans to expand it into a full-fledged game. If you enjoyed the game, please leave a rating or comment, everything helps! Your support & donations are greatly appreciated!!! :) 

P.S. - The game is totally free! When you select download if you don't want to donate anything, select "No thanks, just take me to the downloads". This will allow you to download for free. The only reason it is set up with donations available is that it makes the downloads process faster. If you do wish to donate, select your desired donation amount and continue with your payment method. Thanks!
